ch.aplu.nxtsim

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.nxtsim.Button

  • public class Button
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to simulate the Nxt 'Escape' button by a 'Quit' button in a non-modal dialog.

      A reference to the escape button.
